name: bodyblock-conversion
description: ANVA bodyblock omzetten naar excel files / gewenst fo notatie

scripts.test-to-pbcopy: ts-node src/bin/index.ts -i test/excel/main.xlsx -o test/excel/new.xlsx -d test/source | pbcopy
scripts.demo-5000: npm run compile && node lib/src/bin/index.js -i test/excel/main.xlsx -o test/excel/new.xlsx -d formulieren/pol16/05000
scripts.do-01000-pol16: npm run compile && node lib/src/bin/index.js -i formulieren/clean.xlsx -o dist/pol16/01000.xlsx -d formulieren/pol16/01000
scripts.do-02000-pol16: npm run compile && node lib/src/bin/index.js -i formulieren/clean.xlsx -o dist/pol16/02000.xlsx -d formulieren/pol16/02000
scripts.do-03000-pol16: npm run compile && node lib/src/bin/index.js -i formulieren/clean.xlsx -o dist/pol16/03000.xlsx -d formulieren/pol16/03000
scripts.do-05000-pol16: npm run compile && node lib/src/bin/index.js -i formulieren/clean.xlsx -o dist/pol16/05000.xlsx -d formulieren/pol16/05000
scripts.do-06000-pol16: npm run compile && node lib/src/bin/index.js -i formulieren/clean.xlsx -o dist/pol16/06000.xlsx -d formulieren/pol16/06000
scripts.do-09000-pol16: npm run compile && node lib/src/bin/index.js -i formulieren/clean.xlsx -o dist/pol16/09000.xlsx -d formulieren/pol16/09000
scripts.do-01000-polis: npm run compile && node lib/src/bin/index.js -i formulieren/clean.xlsx -o dist/polis/01000.xlsx -d formulieren/polis/01000
scripts.do-02000-polis: npm run compile && node lib/src/bin/index.js -i formulieren/clean.xlsx -o dist/polis/02000.xlsx -d formulieren/polis/02000
scripts.do-03000-polis: npm run compile && node lib/src/bin/index.js -i formulieren/clean.xlsx -o dist/polis/03000.xlsx -d formulieren/polis/03000
scripts.do-polbe: npm run compile && node lib/src/bin/index.js -i formulieren/clean.xlsx -o dist/polbe/polbe.xlsx -d formulieren/polbe
scripts.do-pakbd: npm run compile && node lib/src/bin/index.js -i formulieren/clean.xlsx -o dist/pakbd/pakbd.xlsx -d formulieren/pakbd
